availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Gabriel Endicott (Lawrence County farmer and prisoner for man slaughter)

body.p: Lawrence County farmer and prisoner in the Kentucky State Penitentiary for manslaughter. Kentucky native.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1342. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 124. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Louisa, p. 137. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Louisa, Precinct 7, p. 9.
